Introduction¶

PyMagic is a Python package with code to help you accomplish miscellaneous and business tasks. With PyMagic you can access a wide variety of applications and APIs for different use cases.

Roadmap¶

PyMagic currently has functionality for the following.

Download and install¶

This package is in the Python Package Index, so pip install pymagic should be enough. You can also clone it on Github.

Licensing¶

PyGithub is distributed under the GNU Lesser General Public Licence. See files COPYING and COPYING.LESSER, as requested by GNU.

What next?¶

You need to use a Github API and wonder which class implements it? Reference of APIs. You want all the details about PyGithub classes? Reference of Classes.
